feed.title: Category: linux | Andhi Noerdianto Personal Website

entry.title: install varnish as a reverse proxy for apache in centos 6
entry.content:
intro:

$ su - $ rpm --nosignature -i http://repo.varnish-cache.org/redhat/varnish-3.0/el6/noarch/varnish-release/varnish-release-3.0-1.el6.noarch.rpm $ yum -y install varnish

case:

  • varnish in port 80
  • apache in port 8080

``` $ vi /etc/varnish/default.vcl change:

backend default {
    .host = "127.0.0.1";
    .port = "80";
}

to:

backend default {
            .host = "127.0.0.1";
            .port = "8080";
    }

$ vi /etc/sysconfig/varnish change:

VARNISH_LISTEN_PORT=6081

to:

VARNISH_LISTEN_PORT=80

$ vi /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf change:

LISTEN 80

to:

LISTEN 8080

$ service httpd restart $ service varnish start $ chkconfig varnish on ```

Regards
{cahkaibon}

entry.title: hello world
entry.content:
Kenalan dulu sama octopress dan markdown

test lagi
ini ganti baris

This is a blockquote with two paragraphs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus. Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.

$ sudo make me a sandwich $ sudo make me a sandwich $ sudo make me a sandwich ``` php Testing Caption Code Snippet if($var === 1){

echo "TRUE";

}else{

echo "FALSE";

} ```
